short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Note Fast is an easy tool to take fast notes online or offline

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Note Fast - Easy Notes App 

Create impressive Note Very Fast for any google chrome users ANY side ONLINE or OFFLINE without having to create a user account.  Including copy/paste feature and scrolling for more content within minutes.

Here's the overview of powerful features.

✅ Integrate field to write your own notes

✅ Fast Copy / Paste

✅ Scroll for unlimited content

✅ No account required, it's very fast

✅ Work Online and Offline

✅ 1 click to save content

And a LOT more.

So many great features, you're going to love this...

If you are tired of opening a notepad every time to take your notes when you browse the web and relieve yourself with this extension, it is really practical.

If you have any questions do not hesitate.
